TopicTitle: Creating maneuver node reduces FPS in map view

Articles.Content:
Creating maneuver node reduces FPS in map view, from 60 to 35-40. If I delete maneuver node FPS increases back to 60 again.

GPU usage is around 9%. It must be CPU related but I don't understand why. Any idea to fix this?
Also when I set a vehicle as target in map view, FPS drops more. It goes back to normal again when unset the vehicle as target.
